name: MyDungeon
description:
A demo for a Mystery Dungeon style engine for Unity currently in development.

Keyboard Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Left CTRL or Mouse Button 1: Attack (in facing direction); Interact (in save room)
  • Shift: Hold to choose facing direction 
  • Space: Hold to only allow diagonal movement
  • Escape: Pause (in save room); Open Inventory (in dungeon)
